member.name: M:DevExpressMods.Reflect.GetMethodDelegate``1(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a delegate to the public or private method on the type that has the specified name and signature. For instance methods, add the instance type as the first argument in the signature.
member.typeparam: The signature of the method and the type of the returned delegate.
member.param: The type that declares the method.
